Update.Changes: Upgraded folder select dialogs in nuke window, "Uninstall from directory" and junk backup to the new Win7+ style Fixed crash when displaying program files leftovers and prevented similar issues in future Fixed Dutch reg key confirm dialog crashing because of error in translated string Fixed crashes with invalid unicode code points in path and other strings Fixed icon extraction from files failing if files were in an UNC path Fixed "could not find CleanLogs.bat" when running from UNC path Fixed SeparataArgsFromCommands failing to separate some "cmd /args" type strings Fixed possible crash in JunkRemoveWindow with invalid IJunkResult without Confidence Fixed possible problem with date AspectToStringConverter, and inconsistent naming of GetAboutUri
